title: FS: 10 Centered Raw T206 Commons VG+ $30 Shipped each *SOLD*
author: boneheadandrube

posts.post_title: FS: 10 Centered Raw T206 Commons VG+ $30 Shipped each *SOLD*
posts.post_content:
ALL SOLD 
PM me if you would like one. Ppal and email are the same:" "

*Note some of the top loads are warped making the cards look wavy. Nothing is trimmed!

Burchell - No Creases
Downs - No Creases, chip on top
Flanagan 1 - No Creases
Flanagan 2 - No Creases, chipped lower left
Lavender - Faint corner crease lower right
Merritt - Faint wrinkle right side, does not travel left
Phelan - Faint wrinkle vertical from bottom center
Seymour - Faint wrinkle right side
Sharpe - No Creases, chip on left
Shannon - Corner crease upper right.

Thanks everyone for all the messages, It looks like someone bought the whole lot at the list price early this morning thru PM. I'll update if it falls through.

GB
